title: Ticket #719: condor_submit should detect missing x509userproxy and fail gracefully
description:
condor_submit doesn't check for the existence of the file specified in x509userproxy. If it's not present, the lower GSI layer will detect the error and fail with awkward: 

Submitting job(s)
ERROR:
GSS Major Status: General failure
GSS Minor Status Error Chain:
globus_gsi_gssapi: Unable to read credential for import: Couldn't open the file: /tmp/x509up_u3014

The expected output might look like 

Submitting job(s)
ERROR:
The specified x509userproxy of /tmp/x509up_u3014 does not exist.
